body.section:
These additional sections in the clouds.yaml file are required only if the HPE Helion Code Engine is installed.
A complete clouds.yaml file is available here for reference.clouds: mycloud: ... helionce: deployer_key: msgtest deployer_flavor: 4 deployer_name: helionce_deployer_01 deployer_security_group: default deployer_version: deployer_image: deployer_uri: deployer_cloud: "helionce" deployer_ntp_servers: deployer_dns_servers: deployer_ext_net_id: deployer_cacert: /home/stack/ca/cacert.pem deployer_cname: "cname" ... helionce: image_api_version: '1' identity_api_version: '2' region_name: region1 insecure: True auth: auth_url: http://##.##.##.##:##/v3 project_name: username: password: project_domain_name: default user_domain_name: default
deployer_key The keypair to use for the deployer instance. Default value: default
deployer_flavor The flavor to use for the deployer instance, Default value: 3 which is Medium. Creating a Large deployer (value: 4) may result in failure with an No space in directory error message. If this happens, set the flavor value to 3 (medium) and try again.
deployer_name The name of the deployer instance. Default value: service_deployer_version
deployer_security_group The name of the security group for the deployer. Default value: default
deployer_version The version of the deployer. Default value: if not set, it will use the version in the image name.
deployer_image The image to use for the deployer. It will attempt to find an image with the prefix helionci or msgaas and containing the word hlinux.
deployer_uri The location where the download the deployer tgz can be found. Will be set by the CLI based on information retrieved from Swift.
deployer_net_id Network id for the deployer instance. Default value: The id of the network named SVC.
deployer_cloud The cloud identified in the clouds.yaml where the deployer will be created. Note that while the deployer creation must be performed by an admin, the deployer itself may be owned by someone else.
deployer_ntp_servers NTP servers, can be the same as the one used by HPE Helion OpenStack
deployer_dns_servers DNS servers, can be the same as the one used by HPE Helion OpenStack
deployer_ext_net_id external network id
deployer_cacert CA cert to send over to the deployer
deployer_cname CN name used to generate the certificate file.
image_api_version: '1'
identity_api_version: '2'
region_name: region1
insecure: True
auth_urlThis URL can be found in Horizon at: Project Compute > Access & Security > API Access or Copy the Service Endpoint URL for the Identity Service. Note that this must be https, not simply http. project_nameThe Name of the admin project in Horizon. usernameThe Username of an account with installation privileges (administrator role). passwordThe Password for the same account with installation privileges (administrator role). project_domain_name: default user_domain_name: default
